title: Mailvox: in which the Dread Ilk are challenged
author: VD
content_html:
TO: Vox Day

I assume that you send your pack of morons (subscribers) to harrass the people on your list of “target-rich environments.”

Therefore, I am requesting to be added to the list.

Why?

I’m in need of fresh meat.

I don’t send anyone anywhere, for any reason, but nevertheless, his request is duly granted. Do you dare to enter…

THE SKEPTIC ARENA?
content_text:

I don’t send anyone anywhere, for any reason, but nevertheless, his request is duly granted.  Do you dare to enter…
